title: Lick Library: Ultimate Guitar Techniques - Legato Licks
description:
Media: DVD (Region 0)
Language: English
Arrangement: Guitar (GTR)
Skill Level: Intermediate/Advanced
Author: Stuart Bull

Description

In this superb DVD, renowned guitarist and teacher Stuart Bull breaks down and explains the exciting guitar technique known as 'legato'.

Smooth, lightning fast runs can be performed easily either ascending or descending the fretboard. Useful scale shapes, legato patterns and six note octave copies are all shown here to great effect. With this fantastic DVD, you can learn the legato styles popularised by guitar legends Joe Satriani and Steve Vai.

If you want to take your guitar techniques to the next level this excellent DVD tutorial will give you a stockpile of legato licks to add to your repertoire.
